https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pNwY2CctdBb464VKKslOe7c0A1R.jpg Get ready for a hilarious fun-filled adventure as 10 year old Caden and his best friend, Charlie, a golden retriever, set out on a wild escapade around town thwarting the evil plans of the bumbling town bullies who are out to break into Caden's Dad's toy shop to steal his new one-of-a-kind toy invention that could literally change the world. Charlie: A Toy Story
